content: knit pop hat cozy hats in black and white and bright for the whole family sizes newborn child large child adult large adult finished circumferences 14 16 18 20 22 36 41 46 51 56 cm yarn spud and chloe sweater 1 skein each of black white and one bright 160 yds each 3 skeins 1 hat in each of the 5 sizes notions us 7 4 5mm 16 /40 cm circular needle and double points or size needed to obtain gauge us 6 4 mm 16 / 40 cm circular needle or one size smaller than gauge needle 5 stitch markers 1 in a contrasting color darning needle pom-pom maker gauge 20 sts=4 /10 cm glossary k= knit k2tog= knit 2 stitches together p = purl sts= stitch es jogless jog for a tidier transition in your stripes of 2 rounds lift the right leg of the stitch below the first stitch of the second round onto the needle and knit it together with the loop of the stitch above pattern ribbed edging with smaller circular needle and bright color yarn cast on 72 80 92 100 112 std join in the round placing contrasting marker to mark beginning being careful not to twist std k2 p2 for 6 6 6 8 8 rounds crown change to larger circular needle and white yarn continue in stockinette stitch knit every round decrease round k2tog 2 0 2 0 2 times evenly spaced 70 80 90 100 110 sts round 2 knit with white round 3 &4 knit with black round 5 & 6 knit with white repeat rounds 3-6 until hat measures approx 3 3/4 4 4 1/4 4 3/4 5 from cast on edge next round place 4 remaining markers every 14 16 18 20 22 sts shaping decrease round *knit to 2 std before marker k2tog* repeat between * * to end 5 std decreased knit 1 round repeat decrease round every round until 5 std remain changing to double points when necessary finished cut yarn leaving an 8 tail with darning needle thread tail through remaining std and draw up tightly weave in ends on wrong side attach pom-pom securely pattern is based on family of stripey hats a free pattern from churchmouse and teas church mouseyarns com and pop hat crochet by sarah lora ravelry
